attributes.review: I have been a trump supporter my entire life, my favorite thing to do before bed is to go online and look at all his sexual assault allegations!😆 But this app is TERRIBLE to say the least. As soon as I downloaded it I got a notification stating that my credit card information had been stolen.😤 I got so mad I threw my phone and as soon as I did that my house went up in flames. The trump administration came down to my house and stabbed my grandma EIGHTEEN TIMES!!😰 My mother was also pregnant and they threw her into our burning house😩I was so upset that I think I might have to vote blue for 2020, sorry you orange slug!🥰 ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆
attributes.title: MY INSURANCE WONT COVER ALL THE DAMAGE

attributes.review: this app hacked my contacts after i put my number in. don’t download. honestly delete the app
attributes.title: WORST APP ZERO STARS

attributes.review: My grandma downloaded this app and promptly had a heart attack after seeing naked photos of trump. Her phone then grew a pair of legs and threw itself into a FIRE. I called back the strange Chinese man who texted me and he REFUSES to pay for her funeral bills, now I have to bury her in my neighbors backyard next to Barry. WOULD NOT DOWNLOAD 😡
attributes.title: MY GRANDMA

attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway because bees don't care what humans think is impossible.
attributes.title: Nah

attributes.review: I was so excited to download the app to show my support to papa trump... but then all of a sudden a big Cheeto puff popped out of nowhere I was frightened 😣I immediately called customer service but they did absolutely nothing!! The customer is always right so why can’t they just fix the app honestly! I got all excited for nothing! I will never get this app again
attributes.title: WORST APP 😖

attributes.review: like i dunno i opened the app and he just popped up saying “get out of my swamp😆😆😆😆😆😆”
attributes.title: trump is my hero but

attributes.review: I tried to get on this app to support our overlord Donal Trump! And all I could find was trash!!!!! What ever you do, DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! It is FAKE NEWS!!!!

attributes.review: This app contains dangerous and deleterious content that can and will cause massive damage and destruction. Avoid it like the plague.
attributes.title: This is a danger to anyone who installs it. Please a avoid.

attributes.review: I just don’t support him really especially with all that he has been doing lately but I did download it if that helped in anyway but again I personally don’t like this app either given the circumstances I downloaded this a 31 seconds ago and yet I don’t like it so I don’t recommend it but good luck...
